page.title: 04A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.30am and get up 5 minutes later. I wash and put on my school uniform. I then go downstairs for my breakfast. When I am ready I make sure I have everything. I get into my car while my friends are walking or are on the bus. I arrive at about 8.40am. We wait until 9.00am to go into school. We have various lessons for about an hour and a half. We have a break of a quarter of an hour. After break we have another hours lessons. Then it is lunchtime from 12.00 to 1.20pm. Although school dinners are provided most people have packed lunch. We then go back to class for more lessons. At 2.20pm we have last break. At 3.30pm everyone goes home. When I get home I change, watch television, have tea and go to bed at 9.00pm.
